8 cups shredded rotisserie chicken,2 (10 1/2 ounce) cans cream of chicken soup,1 cup scallions,,1 (8 ounce) container sour cream,1/2 cup chicken broth,1 tablespoon Dijon mustard,1 1/2 teaspoons garlic powder,1 1/2 teaspoons onion powder,1 1/2 teaspoons black pepper,1 1/2 teaspoons kosher salt,2 sleeves buttery round crackers,1/2 cup unsalted butter,,
